topics.body:
"@Carcass Strife":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/54b3230e63687269c6af1400#post_54b3230e63687269c6af1400
Basically It's about An Invasion from Eldritch beings known as Angels, Some Group called NERV recruits a couple of 14 year olds to pilot Super weapons known as Evangelions to fight the angels. (But rather than it being about them defending the earth and such, It takes a more psychological and existential look at the main cast, The Kids having psychological problems both as a result of their pasts and as a result of having to pilot the EVAs)
